Title: 37797 - # Ways to Safeguard Against Identity Theft
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 ways to protect yourself from identity theft. There are many people that prey upon others for their personal information and it can be easy to access without using protection. Discuss ways people can keep their sensitive information private to prevent someone else from assuming their identity. Talk about some of the things that identity thieves seek to achieve by assuming an identity as well as options and methods available to prevent this from occurring to you. You can mention the client link by talking about the fact that health information is very sensitive. Companies are even required by law to encrypt data to meet HIPAA requirements. Your target audience is people who are tech-savvy.
